meanings.definition: To cover or extend over something.
meanings.sent1: The blanket was overing the sleeping cat.
meanings.sent2: The tablecloth was overing the table perfectly.
meanings.sent3: The clouds were overing the sun, playing peek-a-boo.
meanings.sent4: His love for her was overing all his doubts and fears.
meanings.sent5: The shadow of the tree was overing the entire garden.

meanings.definition: The act of hovering over something.
meanings.sent1: The bird's overing above the nest was a beautiful sight.
meanings.sent2: The drone's overing over the field captured stunning aerial views.
meanings.sent3: The helicopter's overing over the traffic jam saved the day.
meanings.sent4: The dragon's overing over the castle sent shivers down everyone's spines.
meanings.sent5: The superhero's overing over the city gave hope to its citizens.

meanings.definition: The state of being positioned above something.
meanings.sent1: The overing of the chandelier added elegance to the room.
meanings.sent2: The overing of the clouds made the landscape look magical.
meanings.sent3: The overing of the moon over the lake created a romantic ambiance.
meanings.sent4: The overing of the mountain over the valley was a majestic sight.
meanings.sent5: The overing of the airplane over the city signaled the start of a new adventure.
